IGO is a car sharing membership program that offers city residents an economic and environmentally conscious way to travel. Our fleet of newer and cleaner cars, combined with our attentive 24/7 member service has become the new standard in car sharing. With cars available where you need them, when you need them, IGO Car Sharing is for people who want all the benefits of a car without the hassles of owning one.
